COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c
STRING: Standing on the street in front of Copert, I waited for Fal
to arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158
STRING: Focusing my eyes on the clock that I could see inside
the store, I found that I was ten minutes early.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e
STRING: I felt that I had left a little too early, but I was always
making her wait before practice, so it seemed only fair
to be early.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184
STRING: I passed the time by gazing at the droplets of rain
splashing on the pavement.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a
STRING: Recalling my sheets of music and going over them in my
head, I passed the time without being so bored.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0
STRING: Stopping the music in my head at a good point, I
peeked inside Copert a number of times to check the
clock, and when I was doing so, my eyes met with
those of someone

COMMANDS.LABEL: 1b0
STRING: I was not expecting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0
STRING: [Chris] “Fal...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6
STRING: She also noticed me at exactly the same time, and
looked slightly surprised.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fc
STRING: Unsure of whether or not I should go inside, I stood
where I was and waited.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a
STRING: Fal soon opened the door, and called out to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254
STRING: [Fal] “You came at just the right time!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x282
STRING: Do you have
a cooking pot at home?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x298
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... I'm pretty sure I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ca
STRING: [Fal] “Great. Give me just a little bit longer, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x300
STRING: Saying this, she left me and returned back into the
trattoria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c
STRING: A cooking pot...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x318
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x340
STRING: I looked in through the window one more time, but Fal
was no longer anywhere to be seen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356
STRING: However, I was able to see that the hands on the clock
were pointing exactly to the time we had agreed to
meet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a8
STRING: [Fal] “Thanks for waiting!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3be
STRING: It was just at that moment that the door burst open,
and Fal rushed over to me, out of breath and stopping
inches from my face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d4
STRING: [Chris] “N-No... It's okay... You're right on time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x406
STRING: [Fal] “Oh really?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x434
STRING: I was only going to say hello, but they
asked me to help a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x440
STRING: [Chris] “Aha-ha, that sounds like something that would
happen to you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x472
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, you're quite right. I'm so busy!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x488
STRING: Fal didn't seem particularly busy or stressed when she
said that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49e
STRING: That could well be the reason why people always asked
for her help.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4aa
STRING: [Chris] “So, was there something you had to do here?
We're not eating here right? And why did you want to
know if I had a pot?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d2
STRING: [Fal] “Yeah,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x500
STRING: something like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50c
STRING: Fal smiled in a way that showed she was up to
something, and produced a package wrapped in brown
butcher's paper.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x522
STRING: [Chris] “What's that...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x554
STRING: [Fal] “Some meat that's a little too tough to serve, and
some other bits and pieces.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56a
STRING: [Chris] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59c
STRING: [Fal] “I thought I'd make lunch for us.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b2
STRING: [Chris] “That's...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e4
STRING: [Fal] “...A problem?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fa
STRING: [Chris] “No problem at all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62c
STRING: [Fal] “Good. So, shall we go then?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65a
STRING: Ah, this is the right
way, yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x670
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x686
STRING: More or less taking charge, Fal started walking towards
the three-street junction where we went our separate
ways the first time we met.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69c
STRING: Was Fal usually like this...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x708
STRING: [Fal] “Thanks for letting me come over.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71e
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Well, I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x734
STRING: I wasn't sure if Phorni could hear it; I spoke in a voice
that was loud enough, but not overly loud.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x766
STRING: [Fal] “Hehe...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: Fal laughed at the sight of me announcing my return.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x788
STRING: [Chris] “It's just a habit of mine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ba
STRING: [Fal] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d0
STRING: Fal was still looking amused when I handed her a towel
that was sitting near my front door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e6
STRING: Phorni must have prepared them. I took the second one
and dried my hair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x804
STRING: [Fal] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81a
STRING: Fal did the same, and then looked around my room
with a hint of amazement on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84c
STRING: [Fal] “Wow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x862
STRING: [Chris] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x880
STRING: [Fal] “It's clean. I was ready to do it myself, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x896
STRING: [Chris] “Aha... Well it's my place after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c8
STRING: [Fal] “That's too bad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f6
STRING: Oh well! Are you hungry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x902
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, more or less.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x918
STRING: I never really had a habit of eating breakfast, and
considering the possibility that we may have been
eating out, I had chosen not to eat any lunch yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94a
STRING: [Fal] “In that case, can I borrow your kitchen?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x960
STRING: [Chris] “You're really going to cook something...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x992
STRING: [Fal] “I always cook at home anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c0
STRING: So don't worry,
I won't burn your house down.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9cc
STRING: [Chris] “That's not what I'm worried about... Oh, never
mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa08
STRING: [Fal] “Are your pots in the cupboard under the sink?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I think so. What about the ingredients?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa50
STRING: [Fal] “Didn't you see them just before?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa66
STRING: Saying this, she patted the package wrapped in
butchers paper.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa72
STRING: Upon closer inspection, I could see that there were
other things in there too, and that it was actually
bursting at the brim.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa88
STRING: [Chris] “O-Oh, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa2
STRING: I gave up on asking any more questions, and decided to
just observe from the sidelines.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab8
STRING: At least there was no doubting it would taste great.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac4
STRING: Admittedly, I was slightly concerned about the meat
being too tough to serve, but if Fal thought it would be
okay, then I guess it really would be okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb08
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, this is turning into a big mess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1e
STRING: I hadn't said anything to Phorni since we returned, and
she had been watching quietly until she spoke just now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb34
STRING: I walked over to the windowsill, which was away from
the kitchen, and spoke to Phorni in a hushed voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4a
STRING: [Chris] “Apparently she's making lunch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7c
STRING: [Phorni] “You make it sound like it's none of your
business...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb92
STRING: [Chris] “It was a pretty one sided decision, I wasn't given
much chance to say no.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc4
STRING: [Phorni] “I know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbda
STRING: It was fine and all that I'd decided to be on the sidelines
as far as the cooking went, but it was awkward sitting
around doing nothing, so I decided to clean
the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfa
STRING: It didn't require that much effort, however, as I had
cleaned up everything in sight last night and this
morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc10
STRING: I offered to help with whatever I could, but she
declined, so I ended up having nothing to do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc26
STRING: Phorni had moved herself to the top of my bookshelf,
and we communicated through nods and head shakes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc58
STRING: [Phorni] “When are you gonna start practicing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6e
STRING: She asked slightly mean questions like this, and...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc96
STRING: [Phorni] “That smells great!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcac
STRING: She sometimes commented happily like this, and after
responding to this and that, I realized that almost an
hour had passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1e
STRING: [Fal] “It's ready! One freshly cooked casseruola.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd4c
STRING: The
table...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7a
STRING: I see you cleaned it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd86
STRING: [Chris] “You can put it down anywhere.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9c
STRING: “Casseruola” was the name of the particular pot used
for cooking this dish.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb2
STRING: The meal made from the ingredients boiled inside it was
also commonly referred to by the same name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdee
STRING: Fal took a seat at the table, and I sat down across from
her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfa
STRING: It seemed that the lovely smell filling the room had also
piqued Phorni's interest, despite the fact she was
scrunching up her face at the steam coming out of
the pot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1a
STRING: She wouldn't be eating it, but she certainly did seem
interested.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2e
STRING: [Fal] “Okay then, let's eat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe44
STRING: [Chris] “Sure thing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe62
STRING: [Fal] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe78
STRING: [Chris] “Oh no, It just that, you know, I sometimes cook
here, but I honestly wasn't ever expecting to eat
anything so decent, not in my own room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeaa
STRING: [Fal] “I ended up taking a while, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec0
STRING: Perhaps in an effort to hide that she was blushing, she
laughed and prompted me to eat by handing me a
spoon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed6
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, I'm going to dig in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef4
STRING: [Fal] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0a
STRING: I already knew how good it would be.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf16
STRING: I'd eaten food that she had made by herself, on
numerous occasions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2c
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf38
STRING: [Chris] “This is delicious!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4e
STRING: It tasted even better than I had expected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf62
STRING: [Fal] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf78
STRING: There was no need to say anything else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf84
STRING: It sounded easy to make, just boiling the pork and other
vegetables together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9a
STRING: Well, I suppose the act of making it itself was easy,
but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfae
STRING: [Phorni] “It must be great being you right now, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc4
STRING: I would have liked to give some to Phorni if possible,
but there was nothing for it since she couldn't eat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfda
STRING: But, I really did feel sorry for her, so I glanced at her
and sent her an apology with my eyes, and continued
eating.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff8
STRING: [Fal] “There's a lot left, so feel free to have more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100e
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. I don't mind if there are left overs,
though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102c
STRING: [Fal] “Oh okay, good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1042
STRING: With the exception of one grumpy fairy, the meal was
quite enjoyable.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1080
STRING: With nothing to do, and not being able to talk with me
properly, Phorni asked me to place her on the
windowsill. I made an excuse for going over there,
and moved Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a0
STRING: We tidied up after the meal, and then the two of us sat
back down at the table to take a break.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b6
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks for making lunch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d4
STRING: [Fal] “You're welcome.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ea
STRING: Fal rested her chin on her hands, and continued looking
at me with a smile on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1100
STRING: [Chris] “So... Yeah, thanks again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111e
STRING: [Fal] “Hm? Oh, I wasn't waiting for you to thank me
more or anything like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1134
STRING: Staying seated in the exact same position, Fal started to
talk about something completely different.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1152
STRING: [Fal] “Do you wonder why I was working so much at a
time like this, with graduation recitals getting so close?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1188
STRING: Truth be told, I had thought about that question many
times.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1194
STRING: And I also had my own suspicions as to the answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a0
STRING: It wasn't as if there were that many possible reasons
why, anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b6
STRING: Of course, that doesn't mean that the reason couldn't
be something totally unexpected and out of this world.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d4
STRING: [Fal] “Well, I suppose you have probably already
worked it out for yourself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ea
STRING: [Chris] “You never know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1208
STRING: [Fal] “To put it simply, I need the money to get by.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121e
STRING: [Chris] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: The problem was, why did she need to work just to get
by when she was a student...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1252
STRING: [Fal] “Hm? What's the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1268
STRING: [Chris] “It's nothing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1286
STRING: [Fal] “It's not such a big deal. There's plenty of other
students who are working as well, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a6
STRING: [Chris] “That's true, I've heard of that kind of thing
before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12bc
STRING: I was sure this had come up in conversations with Torta
or Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12da
STRING: [Fal] “And I only work four days a week; it's not that
much, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f0
STRING: [Chris] “That's hard for me to say... I don't work a single
day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130e
STRING: [Fal] “Part of it is because I like working too. And
besides, even though as of yesterday my hours are
shorter, I'm still going to get the same pay as
before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 130e
STRING: [Fal] Don't you think that's amazing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1340
STRING: [Fal] “Of course, I'll put even more effort in to make up
for it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1356
STRING: As if it were nothing...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1362
STRING: Fal spoke of it as if it wasn't significant at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1378
STRING: She didn't go into detail about why she had to work.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1384
STRING: And I didn't mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1390
STRING: I was afraid of getting more deeply involved, and there
were some things that couldn't be changed no matter
what one did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a6
STRING: [Chris] “I see. But, why did you decide to tell me...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c4
STRING: [Fal] “Because you wanted to know... I guess? And also,
because we hadn't been able to practice much at all on
weekdays.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ec
STRING: [Fal] “But having said that, I suppose you're not exactly
practicing every single day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140c
STRING: I didn't know that had been bothering her...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1418
STRING: I wonder how long I had been practicing so
half-heartedly while she had been so dedicated?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142e
STRING: [Chris] “You've got a point there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1444
STRING: Matching her tone, I responded in a joking manner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1450
STRING: And then, I remembered what she had said first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145c
STRING: “Because you wanted to know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1468
STRING: I wonder if I had really thought that I wanted to know
her more deeply?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x147e
STRING: Or was it just curiosity?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148a
STRING: Or could it have been...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x149e
STRING: [Fal] “Sorry for bringing this kind of thing up. Well, we've
had a break now, so shall we get some practice in?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14be
STRING: [Chris] “We probably should.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e6
STRING: I stood up with some vigor in order to brighten the
mood, and walked over to my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1518
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152e
STRING: Phorni, who was supposed to be lazing about on the
windowsill, was now looking at me with a serious look
on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1544
STRING: I approached the windowsill as if checking the weather
outside, and waited for her to speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1558
STRING: [Phorni] “Practice seriously, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x156e
STRING: I nodded sincerely, and then sat down at my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b4
STRING: After I saw Fal off, I collected my weekly letter from Arie
and returned to my apartment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ca
STRING: Once again, I could smell the aroma of the casseruole
still lingering in my apartment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e0
STRING: I had no issues with eating the same thing multiple
times in one day, so I decided to have the casseruola
for dinner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f6
STRING: As our lunch today was slightly late, I wasn't actually
hungry yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160c
STRING: I decided to read the letter from Arie first, and sat
myself down at my desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x165a
STRING: Dear Chris. I wonder, is it still raining there as you read
this letter?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166e
STRING: The weather here is lovely, as usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1684
STRING: Is it about time for you to choose your partner for your
graduation recital?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a2
STRING: In your last letter, you mentioned that it might not be
Torta, but do you have anyone else?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c0
STRING: I guess I'm a little worried, because I know you're not so
good at making new friends.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16de
STRING: I think I wrote the exact same thing when you first
enrolled, but you ended up making great friends, like
Asino, didn't you?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fe
STRING: So, I suppose I'm not so worried about whether or not
you can make friends...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x171c
STRING: It's something else that I'm worried about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1730
STRING: Where I am is so far away from where you are now, so I
can only know the things that Torta tells me, right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1758
STRING: That's why I've started to feel a little concerned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176c
STRING: I heard that one of your possible partners is a girl.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1780
STRING: And that she's pretty, and a lovely person.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1794
STRING: I know that in terms of percentages it's fifty-fifty, so I'm
not trying to blame you because it's a girl.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b2
STRING: But you know, I just can't help but be concerned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c6
STRING: I know it sounds like I'm complaining, but you'll forgive
me, won't you?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e4
STRING: There's one more thing. I have unfortunate news.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17fa
STRING: I'm not sure I'll be able to visit you this year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180e
STRING: Just like it has been three years since you started your
student life, it's also been three years since I started
working here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182c
STRING: I've put a lot of time and effort into my work, and I also
happen to like doing it, so I'm happy to report that I've
recently been given more responsibilities, including the
training of new staff.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1854
STRING: I'm going to be particularly busy at the end of the year,
so it doesn't seem like I'll be able to get away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1872
STRING: It's such a shame I won't be able to see you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1888
STRING: But you seem busy with the practice for your graduation
recital, Chris, so I'll be patient this time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a6
STRING: But thinking about that now... I won't have to be patient
for much longer, will I?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c4
STRING: I really can't wait for that day to come.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d8
STRING: Take care, I'll write again soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ec
STRING: P.S.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1902
STRING: Regardless of who you choose as your partner, just
make sure to tell Torta first, okay?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1920
STRING: She's always worried about you and how you're doing,
you know?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1934
STRING: I asked her to look out for you, since I can't be there to
do it myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195c
STRING: Love, Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x199a
STRING: I needed slightly more time than usual to rouse myself
from the feeling Arie's letter had left me with.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19b0
STRING: I hadn't decided on who my partner would be... Not
yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19bc
STRING: That was the unclouded truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c8
STRING: But, if my heart had already started pointing towards
what laid in the future, then I suppose I had already
made a choice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0c
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a22
STRING: [Chris] “Hm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a54
STRING: [Phorni] “What did Arie say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6a
STRING: [Chris] “Just the same as usual.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a80
STRING: I traced the surface of the carefully folded letter, and
whispered the words once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a96
STRING: [Chris] “The same as usual.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aac
STRING: For some reason I was unable to start writing my
response immediately, and I just sat at my desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac2
STRING: Supposing that I followed the excuse I had been telling
my heart, and I chose not to partner up with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad8
STRING: Would that result not end up being a betrayal of both
Arie and Torta?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aee
STRING: The pleasant smell of the casseruole clashed with the
vague feeling of concern that I had, so I stood up to
open the window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0c
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b22
STRING: Phorni was standing on top of my music stand,
beckoning to me with her hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b54
STRING: [Phorni] “Let's play something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba4
STRING: Inside the waves of sound, I was not bound by anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bba
STRING: I felt the pleasant sound of her voice on my skin, and I
let myself be taken over by the sensation of the waves
gently rocking me to my core.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd2
STRING: I wasn't sure how many songs we played in succession.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be0
STRING: But we clearly played more songs than we normally did,
as it had already reached the time of night when we
would usually be asleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bf8
STRING: Not spending a moment to enjoy the afterglow of our
songs, I rushed to the window to check outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2e
STRING: It was dark, and I realized that it had become quite late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c44
STRING: I quickly prepared to write my letter back to Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c8c
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh my, it's gotten pretty late, hasn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca2
STRING: [Chris] “It sure has. I better get writing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cd4
STRING: [Phorni] “Otherwise you won't have it ready by
tomorrow morning, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cea
STRING: Phorni moved her face closer to get a look at what I
was writing, which was unusual for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d00
STRING: [Chris] “Didn't I tell you a long time ago, not to look?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d32
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, c'mon! I wanna see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d48
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not going to write anything particularly
special.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d7a
STRING: [Phorni] “Are you going to write about which partner
you'll choose? She asked you, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d90
STRING: [Chris] “I'm going to write that I haven't made a decision
yet...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc2
STRING: [Phorni] “You haven't?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd8
STRING: [Chris] “That's what I just said.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0a
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e20
STRING: Phorni nodded as if she understood, and didn't seem
phased by my tone of voice, which had become slightly
irritated.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e36
STRING: And then, not being too trivial or too serious, she said
something else to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e68
STRING: [Phorni] “You'll need to make a decision soon, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e9c
STRING: Upon saying this, she fluttered her wings just once, and
disappeared.
